name: Lit Protocol
challengeTitle: Hub - A Data Self-sovereignty Implementation and SDK
challengeDesc: For this bounty, use Lit Protocol and Ceramic Network to create a novel consent and data sharing system for individual users and the applications they use.
benefitIntro: Our team has fully integrated Lit Protocol into our community application, allowing users full control over their content.
benefit1: Our beautiful NEW native mobile UI/UX permits users to Create, Manage and Share their permissioned content.
benefit2: Users can easily verify and consume private content created with the Lit Protocol.
benefit3: Encourage greater use of permissioned and private content throughout the Web3 community.
benefitClose: We will continue to research & explore new and better ways of integrating with Lit Protocol.
